info.name: Steamy Sips API Documentation
info.description:
---

## Authentication

Not implemented yet.

### Authentication error response

If an API key is missing, malformed, or invalid, you will receive an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response code.

[
    {
        "review_id": 1,
        "rating": 5,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:11:02",
        "text": "i really like this product. I have a verified badge since I have actually bought this product.",
        "client_id": 1,
        "product_id": 1
    },
    {
        "review_id": 5,
        "rating": 1,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:21:56",
        "text": "this is a negative review",
        "client_id": 2,
        "product_id": 1
    }
]

item.description: The /products endpoints let you manage your products.

response.name: Successful response
Successful response
response.body:
[
    {
        "review_id": 1,
        "product_id": 1,
        "client_id": 1,
        "text": "i really like this product. I have a verified badge since I have actually bought this product.",
        "rating": 5,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:11:02"
    },
    {
        "review_id": 2,
        "product_id": 2,
        "client_id": 1,
        "text": "the coffee is decent but nothing special",
        "rating": 3,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:11:24"
    },
    {
        "review_id": 3,
        "product_id": 3,
        "client_id": 1,
        "text": "i would love to buy this again but the price is not worth it",
        "rating": 2,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:11:53"
    },
    {
        "review_id": 4,
        "product_id": 3,
        "client_id": 1,
        "text": "Note the calculation for average rating does not consider unverified reviews",
        "rating": 1,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:14:04"
    },
    {
        "review_id": 5,
        "product_id": 1,
        "client_id": 2,
        "text": "this is a negative review",
        "rating": 1,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:21:56"
    },
    {
        "review_id": 6,
        "product_id": 3,
        "client_id": 2,
        "text": "this is a wonderful product that changed my life",
        "rating": 3,
        "created_date": "2024-05-16 11:22:44"
    }
]

response.name: Invalid attributes
Missing review ID
response.body: Request has not been defined in $routes for Steamy\Controller\API\Reviews

response.name: Successful response
response.body:
{
    "review_id": 1,
    "product_id": 1,
    "client_id": 1,
    "text": "i really like this product. I have a verified badge since I have actually bought this product.",
    "rating": 5,

}
